name: part_010
file: tmp_【 #常闇トワ6周年記念LIVE 】ROCK Festa !!!【 3DLIVE 】 [pmWH-wAJYRE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Tokoyami Towa and Hoshimachi Suisei performing 'Daizero Kan'.
Tokoyami Towa and Mori Calliope performing 'Mugen'.
Tokoyami Towa giving an MC speech after the guest performances.

subtitles.original: スイちゃーんよー！
subtitles.english: Suisei-chan here!

subtitles.original: スイちゃーんよー！
subtitles.english: Suisei-chan here!

subtitles.original: 永遠の意味を知らぬ君に
subtitles.english: To you, who knows not the meaning of eternity

subtitles.original: 答えを示せる時が来た
subtitles.english: The time has come to show the answer

subtitles.original: 無限に続く螺旋の先へ
subtitles.english: To the end of the infinitely continuing spiral

subtitles.original: 問いの裏に聞こえた理由は
subtitles.english: The reason I heard behind the question

subtitles.original: 儚い未来手繰った弱さ
subtitles.english: Was the fragility of reaching for a fleeting future

subtitles.original: それを強さとはき違えている
subtitles.english: I've mistaken that for strength

subtitles.original: 憎い　醜い
subtitles.english: Hateful, ugly

subtitles.original: 月を隠すほどの
subtitles.english: Enough to hide the moon

subtitles.original: 黒く　淀む　心
subtitles.english: Black, stagnant, heart

subtitles.original: 君さえいなければ
subtitles.english: If only you weren't here

subtitles.original: 揺らいでる　揺らいでる
subtitles.english: Swaying, swaying

subtitles.original: 花のように萎（しぼ）む　意思を繋ぐ
subtitles.english: Connecting the will that withers like a flower

subtitles.original: 奪っていく　奪っていく
subtitles.english: Taking away, taking away

subtitles.original: 嵐のように心　疼く
subtitles.english: Like a storm, my heart aches

subtitles.original: 永遠の意味を知らぬ君に
subtitles.english: To you, who knows not the meaning of eternity

subtitles.original: 答えを示せる時が来た
subtitles.english: The time has come to show the answer

subtitles.original: 無限に続く螺旋の先へ
subtitles.english: To the end of the infinitely continuing spiral

subtitles.original: 待つのは誰
subtitles.english: Who is waiting?

subtitles.original: 生まれ落ちた運命（さだめ）を飲んで
subtitles.english: Drinking the fate I was born into

subtitles.original: 背負った傷の名前を覚えた
subtitles.english: I remembered the names of the scars I carried

subtitles.original: 溢れるほど　心燃やす感情
subtitles.english: Emotions that burn my heart to overflowing

subtitles.original: 憎い　醜い
subtitles.english: Hateful, ugly

subtitles.original: 世界を分かつほどの
subtitles.english: Enough to divide the world

subtitles.original: 怒り　燃やす　心
subtitles.english: Anger, burning heart

subtitles.original: 君さえいなければ
subtitles.english: If only you weren't here

subtitles.original: 揺らいでる　揺らいでる
subtitles.english: Swaying, swaying

subtitles.original: 花のように萎（しぼ）む　意思を繋ぐ
subtitles.english: Connecting the will that withers like a flower

subtitles.original: 奪っていく　奪っていく
subtitles.english: Taking away, taking away

subtitles.original: 嵐のように心　疼く
subtitles.english: Like a storm, my heart aches

subtitles.original: 永遠の意味を知らぬ君に
subtitles.english: To you, who knows not the meaning of eternity

subtitles.original: 答えを示せる時が来た
subtitles.english: The time has come to show the answer

subtitles.original: 無限に続く螺旋の先へ
subtitles.english: To the end of the infinitely continuing spiral

subtitles.original: 地獄耳　傾け仕舞いよ
subtitles.english: Lend your sharp ears, it's the end

subtitles.original: この身に宿れば万事出仕舞いよ
subtitles.english: If it dwells in this body, it's all over

subtitles.original: 逃げを他者に託した弱き人
subtitles.english: A weak person who entrusts their escape to others

subtitles.original: 命の輝きは幾千層に
subtitles.english: The radiance of life is in thousands of layers

subtitles.original: 祈りの瞬きが照らすように
subtitles.english: Like the twinkling of prayers shining

subtitles.original: 夜を宿し
subtitles.english: Harbor the night

subtitles.original: 回答を叩きつけろ
subtitles.english: And strike back with the answer

subtitles.original: 枯らしていく　枯らしていく
subtitles.english: Wither away, wither away

subtitles.original: 夢幻の夜に花を咲く
subtitles.english: Flowers bloom in the phantom night

subtitles.original: 繋いでいく　繋いでいく
subtitles.english: Connecting, connecting

subtitles.original: 嵐に種を撒いていく
subtitles.english: Sowing seeds in the storm

subtitles.original: 揺らいでる　揺らいでる
subtitles.english: Swaying, swaying

subtitles.original: 花のように萎（しぼ）む　意思を繋ぐ
subtitles.english: Connecting the will that withers like a flower

subtitles.original: 奪っていく　奪っていく
subtitles.english: Taking away, taking away

subtitles.original: 嵐のように心　疼く
subtitles.english: Like a storm, my heart aches

subtitles.original: 永遠の意味を知らぬ君に
subtitles.english: To you, who knows not the meaning of eternity

subtitles.original: 答えを示せる時が来た
subtitles.english: The time has come to show the answer

subtitles.original: 無限に続く螺旋の先で
subtitles.english: At the end of the infinitely continuing spiral

subtitles.original: 待つのは誰
subtitles.english: Who is waiting?

subtitles.original: 以上、ゲストパートでした！
subtitles.english: That's it for the guest segment!

subtitles.original: ゲストパートでしたー！　いぇーい！
subtitles.english: That was the guest segment! Yay!

subtitles.original: はい。ということで、たくさんのメンバーがね、お祝いしに来てくれました！　やったー！
subtitles.english: Yes. So, many members came to celebrate! Hooray!

subtitles.original: そして、本日の6周...
subtitles.english: And, for today's 6th anni...
